name: Vaadin.VaadinDialog

properties.name: opened
properties.description: True if the overlay is currently displayed.

properties.name: noCloseOnOutsideClick
properties.description: Set to true to disable closing dialog on outside click

properties.name: noCloseOnEsc
properties.description: Set to true to disable closing dialog on Escape press

description:
`<vaadin-dialog>` is a Polymer 2 element for customised modal dialogs.

```html
<vaadin-dialog opened>
  <template>
    Sample dialog
  </template>
</vaadin-dialog>
```

### Styling

[Generic styling/theming documentation](https://cdn.vaadin.com/vaadin-valo-theme/0.3.1/demo/customization.html)

See [`<vaadin-overlay>` documentation](https://github.com/vaadin/vaadin-overlay/blob/master/vaadin-overlay.html)
for `<vaadin-dialog-overlay>` parts.
